sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with yue shui bu tong 月水不通 . Pu ji fang 普濟方 333 : 神仙活命丹，治婦 人血氣凝滯，月信不來，日漸羸瘦 , “The ‘spirit-hermit elixir to support life’ cures females with congealed blood and sluggish qi, [resulting in] menstrual blockage . They gradually lose weight day by day”. Yue xin lai duo 月信來多 , excessive menstruation [1]

Pathological Condition identical with jing shui guo duo 經水過多 . Shi liao ben cao 食療本草 Substance Entry chun 椿：女子血 崩及產後血不止，月信來多。可取東引細根一大握，洗之，以水一大 升煮，分再服，便斷 , “For [treating] a woman’s blood collapse and incessant bleeding following delivery, as well as excessive menstruation , one may grasp a large handful of its fine roots stretching eastward, cleanse them and boil them with one large sheng of water. This is to be ingested divided into several portions, and will end [the bleeding] immediately”.
